Enums/CaffeinationError.html#/s:11Caffei.name: caffeinateNotFound
Enums/CaffeinationError.html#/s:11Caffei.abstract: Thrown if the caffeinate executable cannot be found.

Enums/CaffeinationError.html#/s:11Caffei.name: alreadyActive
Enums/CaffeinationError.html#/s:11Caffei.abstract: Thrown if an attempt is made to start a Caffeination on an already-active instance.

Enums/LogLevel.html.name: LogLevel
Enums/LogLevel.html.abstract: Indicates the level of logging to be performed by CaffeineKit.

Enums/CaffeinationError.html.name: CaffeinationError
Enums/CaffeinationError.html.abstract: An error related to core CaffeineKit functionality.

Classes/Caffeination/Opt.html#/s:11Caffe.name: user
Classes/Caffeination/Opt.html#/s:11Caffe.abstract: Simulates user activity to keep display awake.

Classes/Caffeination/Opt.html#/s:11Caffe.name: process(_:)
Classes/Caffeination/Opt.html#/s:11Caffe.abstract: Terminates Caffeination when process with specified PID exits. Might be preempted by .timed.

Classes/Caffeination/Opt.html#/s:11Caffe.name: timed(_:)
Classes/Caffeination/Opt.html#/s:11Caffe.abstract: Terminates Caffeination after specified period of time in seconds. Might be preempted by .process.

Classes/Caffeination/Opt.html#/s:11Caffe.name: defaults
Classes/Caffeination/Opt.html#/s:11Caffe.abstract: The default options for a standard Caffeination.

Classes/Caffeination/Opt.html#/s:11Caffe.name: argumentList
Classes/Caffeination/Opt.html#/s:11Caffe.abstract: Converts an Opt to the raw argument(s) passed to caffeinate.

Classes/Caffeination/Opt.html#/s:11Caffe.name: from(_:)
Classes/Caffeination/Opt.html#/s:11Caffe.abstract: Returns an Opt corresponding to a single caffeinate argument string.

Classes/Caffeination/Opt.html#/s:11Caffe.name: from(_:)
Classes/Caffeination/Opt.html#/s:11Caffe.abstract: Returns an Opt from a [String] containing a single argument to caffeinate and, if necessary, an associated numerical argument.

Classes/Caffeination/Opt.html#/s:11Caffe.name: array(from:)
Classes/Caffeination/Opt.html#/s:11Caffe.abstract: Returns an [Opt] from a [String] containing raw arguments (and their associated integer values, if needed) to caffeinate, or nil if an invalid value is passed (see discussion).

Classes/Caffeination.html#/s:11CaffeineK.name: caffeinateExists
Classes/Caffeination.html#/s:11CaffeineK.abstract: Indicates whether the caffeinate executable is in the correct location.

Classes/Caffeination.html#/s:11CaffeineK.name: limitCaffeinationLifetime
Classes/Caffeination.html#/s:11CaffeineK.abstract: If true, will automatically set the caffeinate process to terminate with this application’s termination (when the .process option is not passed). Has no bearing on traps.

Classes/Caffeination.html#/s:11CaffeineK.name: terminationHandler
Classes/Caffeination.html#/s:11CaffeineK.abstract: The function to be executed once the Caffeination terminates.

Classes/Caffeination.html#/s:11CaffeineK.name: interceptAppTermination
Classes/Caffeination.html#/s:11CaffeineK.abstract: Whether the Caffeination will be automatically terminated when the app is quit using the Quit menu or receives a termination signal. Setting this property will enable or disable this safety mechanism. Not to be confused

Classes/Caffeination.html#/s:11CaffeineK.name: closure(_:)
Classes/Caffeination.html#/s:11CaffeineK.abstract: Generates a closure that Caffeinates for the duration of its execution. Inherits the Caffeination object’s opts, of which only .disk, .display, .idle, and .user will be honored.

Classes/Caffeination.html#/s:11CaffeineK.name: silentClosure(_:)
Classes/Caffeination.html#/s:11CaffeineK.abstract: Generates a Caffienated closure that prioritizes execution of the closure above Caffeination. Thus, a closure will be returned and be allowed to run even if caffeinate cannot be started. Failures to start caffeinate will occur silently; manually use Caffeination.caffeinateExists to check that the intended behavior will occur.

Classes/Caffeination.html#/s:11CaffeineK.name: start(withOpts:)
Classes/Caffeination.html#/s:11CaffeineK.abstract: Starts preventing sleep (i.e., the Caffeination) with the specified options, overriding any that may have previously been set.

Classes/Caffeination.html#/s:11CaffeineK.name: stop()
Classes/Caffeination.html#/s:11CaffeineK.abstract: Stops the Caffeination if it is active.
